dashboard.description: Your AI-powered learning assistant for notes, quizzes, tests, and more.
dashboard.generateMaterials.title: Generate Study Materials
dashboard.generateMaterials.description: Let AI create comprehensive notes, quizzes, and flashcards for any topic.
dashboard.customTest.title: Create Custom Test
dashboard.customTest.description: Build a tailored test from topics, notes, or recent study sessions.

dashboard.dailyNews.description: Catch up on the latest headlines from around the world, filtered your way.
dashboard.dailyMotivation.title: Daily Motivation
dashboard.dailyQuests.title: Daily Quests
dashboard.exploreFeatures.title: Explore All Features
dashboard.recentTopics.title: Recent Topics
dashboard.recentTopics.description: Quickly jump back into your recent study sessions.
dashboard.recentTopics.empty: No recent topics. Generate some study materials to see them here!
dashboard.totalLearnersGuestMessage: Sign up to see community stats!
generate.title: Generate Study Materials
generate.description: Enter any academic topic. LearnMint AI will generate notes, a 30-question quiz, and 20 flashcards, then take you to the Study Hub.
generate.toast.invalidTopicDesc: Topic must be at least 3 characters long.
audioFactory.title: Audio Factory
audioFactory.description: Generate spoken summaries from text, images, or documents, and create audio flashcards.
audioFactory.flashcards.title: Audio Flashcards Generator
audioFactory.flashcards.description: Create flashcards with male & female voice narration.
audioFactory.image.title: Image Audio Summarizer
audioFactory.image.description: Upload an image to get a spoken summary.
audioFactory.pdf.title: PDF Audio Summarizer
audioFactory.pdf.description: Upload a PDF to get a spoken summary of its content.
audioFactory.imageTooLarge: Image is too large. Please upload an image under 2MB.
audioFactory.pdfTooLarge: PDF is too large. Please upload a file under 5MB.
audioFactory.pdfExtractError: Could not extract text from PDF.
